data.name: Lethal Company
data.detailed_description:
Lethal Company is a 4-player cooperative horror roguelite. You are part of a scavenger crew who received a distress signal from an abandoned moon, 41 Experimentation. Search for the source of the signal and collect precious artifacts, but beware of what else you might find there. Will you descend further to reach the source of the signal, or will you cut your losses?

Don't go it alone.

Lethal Company is not a single-player game. The dangers of Experimentation will prey first upon the most vulnerable and lonesome; should you slip up and let in an Intruder, the protection of your crew may be your only hope.

Don't let them in.

The evils you face can be prevented. Intruders take time to establish their physical form, and if you find them soon enough, you can ward them off. But once they've entered the facility, they will not be rid of.

data.short_description: A co-op horror roguelite about an abandoned industrial moon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a realistic atmosphere. Player characters can die through various means, some involving dismemberment or decapitation.
